PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05972019-05-31NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016 (Amendment 16)
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 16) in order to (1) reduce Greenhouse gas emissions and energy consumption associated with energy-using products in a manner that aligns with other jurisdictions, where feasible and appropriate; (2) reduce the load on the electricity system associated with the building sector; (3) reduce energy costs incurred by households, businesses and institutions; and, (4) reduce unnecessary regulatory differences between Canadian and United States regulations across new and existing product categories to support cross-border trade.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0163 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
